A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There's a good amount of cheese (more than I cared for)\, but overall\, this was a highly entertaining addition to the franchise . There is some really strong character development\, though not in the way many expected\, and if you look closer at the individual story lines and sub-plots (even ones that seem pointless on the surface)\, there is a strong underlying theme of [not gonna spoil it]\, with each main character dealing with it in their own way.
